CONTRACTORS' BILL

INSTRUCTIONS

1. Each bill must refer to only one order/contract or station as the case may be.

2. Bill should prepaired in ink and the original copy recipted and stamped where the amount exceed Rs. 20/- and should be supported by the original copy (ies) of Inspection Notes/ Supply Order/IAFS-1520/Transport Indent and Order Form.

3. Seperate bills should be prepared for each month's supply also for supplies made under contract and out of contract and for other depots in the case of M. S. Depots.

4. Bllls or supplies made under A. S. C. contracts should be submitted direct to the C. D. A. In all other cases the bills should be submitted through the Officer issuing th supply orders or Transport Indent, etc. In the latter cases extra copies of bill should be prepared and submitted along with the original where required .

5. The Instructions contained in the pamphlet, " Instructions for the guidance of A. S. C. Contractors in the preparation of their bills for supplies-1935" should in general , be followed in the preparation of bills.
